text: "Listen Like Thieves" is a 1986 song by Australian new wave band INXS. It is the title track from their fifth studio album Listen Like Thieves. It went to number 28 in Australia, number 46 in the United Kingdom and number 54 in United States. It was covered by Was (Not Was) in 1992. Category:1986 songs Category:INXS songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Listen Like Thieves (song)
